meanings.definition: Declare ineligible for a competition or job.
meanings.sent1: If you cheat, it disqualifies you from the race.
meanings.sent2: Using performance-enhancing drugs disqualifies athletes from competing.
meanings.sent3: Trying to bribe the judges disqualifies you from winning fairly.
meanings.sent4: His lack of experience disqualifies him from applying for the position.
meanings.sent5: A false start disqualifies a runner from the race immediately.

meanings.definition: To make someone or something ineligible for something.
meanings.sent1: Eating unhealthy food can disqualify you from being a professional athlete.
meanings.sent2: Not meeting the age requirement can disqualify you from entering the contest.
meanings.sent3: Accidentally breaking the rules disqualifies your team from the tournament.
meanings.sent4: A technical error disqualifies the submission from consideration.
meanings.sent5: Lack of proper documentation can disqualify you from receiving the scholarship.
